name: RV Park Life
summary: RV Park Life is a management game where players can expand the size of their camp by building recreational areas, improving facilities, managing staff, and setting up monetization mechanisms for each area. We hope that players can immerse themselves in nature like a real camper in this game, and at the same time gain a sense of growth and achievement, let them become the managers of the campsite, and let every camper have a pleasant Accommodation experience.
